::Shadow Wing::

She gained altitude, turned and swooped down firing optic lazars at 
Grim Reaper and the other Preds.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Ramhorn:
> 
> 
> 
> Ramhorn stepped out of the door of the Ark, taking aim with both 
weapons.  He 
> fired off 20 sonic shells at Grim Reaper's sternum, and three laser 
bolts 
> from his pistol at Rush's abdomen.
